name: Attuned_Preventive_Medicine_F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. While slotted this enhancement has a chance every 5 seconds to give you an absorption barrier. If your health is between 31% and 75%, this power has a 10% chance of triggering. However, if your health is less than 31% there is a 100% chance of it triggering. This effect can only trigger once every 90 seconds.
